local_intent: Execute grasp at computed goal_pose using pinch strategy, close gripper, and verify stability.
assumptions: goal_pose has been computed and is available on the blackboard
gripper is open prior to closing during grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp micro-step: checks pose availability, executes GraspAtPose with pose_key=goal_pose and strategy=pinch, then closes the gripper and verifies stability, consistent with the GLOBAL_BT sequence.
